# JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy.millisecondsSince1970

**Case**

The strategy that decodes dates in terms of milliseconds since midnight UTC on January 1st, 1970.

## Declaration

```swift
case millisecondsSince1970
```

## Epoch Formats

- **JSONDecoder.DateDecodingStrategy.secondsSince1970**: The strategy that decodes dates in terms of seconds since midnight UTC on January 1st, 1970.
